modName: Saved Game Files for Skyrim NO DLC at all
summary: These game saves are for those people who have played many times and just don't want to play through the Intro. All saves have no DLC or mods of any kind meaning no extras. No Hearthfire, Dragonborn, Dawnguard, or even Highres texture packs DLC.... So No Conflicts
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][b][color=#ff0000][u]100% Clean Game Saves![/u][/color][/b][/size][/center]

[size=3][color=#ffff00]What you ask are these for? [/color]These game saves are for those people who have played many times and just don't want to play through the Intro (Cart Ride) or Helgen ever again!

[color=#ffff00]Why did I make them?[/color] Because I could and well I love Skyrim and I was bored (Oh and I wanted to contribute some thing to this game since I don't have the know how to make a real Mod YET). LOL

[color=#ffff00]When you say 100% Clean what do you mean?[/color] I mean 100% Clean game saves, All Skyrim files that had dirty edits cleaned with TES5Edit, No Tweeks of the Skyrim.ini or Skyrimpref.ini (my Skyrim is set to Ultra not that it really matters), No SKSE, No Mods, No Hearthfire, No Dawnguard, No Dragonborn, No HiRes Texture packs. Also cleaned with save game script cleaner just to be 100% sure.

[color=#ffff00]Why does that matter?[/color] This is so that no matter what you have added to your Skyrim play these Game Saves can be used without issues. (As of right now these saves may or may not be useful for the Skyrim Special Edition according to articles I have read it seems to be a hit and miss on wether or not original saves will work with SSE)

[color=#ffff00]How do I use them?[/color] Download, Unzip, ( I prefer 7zip because it is free and it also opens .zip and .rar files http://www.7-zip.org/) Copy and paste or drag and drop the save game file to your save game folder (Usually C:\Users\your user profile name\Documents\MyGames\Skyrim\Saves) and then play Skyrim. [u]For those who use Profiles for Mod Orginizer and Nexus Mod Manager and have it marked to use seperate saves for each Profile I can not help you on where to put the saves sorry![/u]

To change the looks of your character hit the Tilde ~ Key and the Dev console will pop up at the bottom of your screen then type in showracemenu and hit enter then again hit the Tilde ~ Key and proceed to change the looks of your character and rename them... (Remember if you change race and or sex it will mess with your stats! Another reason I am including the different races and genders.)

Below is the list of Game Saves

1.) BeforeCharacterCreation.zip This Save is for those who do not mind playing through Helgen but don't like that Cart Ride.

2.) ImperialOrStormcloak.zip This Save is where you make your choice Hadvar Imperial or Ralof Stormcloak.

3.) ImperialOutsideHelgenCave.zip This Save is where you Followed Hadvar Imperial and is saved right outside the Helgen cave.

4.) StormcloakOutsideHelgenCave.zip This Save is where you Followed Ralof Stormcloak and is saved right outside the Helgen cave.

5.) ImperialRiverwood.zip This save is in Riverwood right outside Hadvar's Uncle Alvor's home after talking to him.

6.)StormcloakRiverwood.zip This save is in Riverwood right outside Ralof's Sister Gerdur's home after talking to her.

Feel Free to contact me in regards to these saves I will do my best to figure out any problems etc. you may have with them. I will simply delete messages that are rude and abusive there is no reason for that![/size]
author: Valaria69
